item.title: Ship of Fools
item.description:
What follows is one of the strangest pieces of journalism I have ever done. It was originally published at Breaker magazine, a crypto-focused outlet which has since folded, taking the archive with it. People keep asking me what happened to it. Here it is. As ever, most of the content on this substack is free- but if my writing is worth something to you, and you have the means to become a paid subscriber, I‘d really appreciate it. Despite my best efforts to self-optimise I still live in a body that needs to be housed and fed…

URL: https://lauriepenny.substack.com/p/ship-of-fools?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Yet Another Attempt at a Better “Slouching Towards Utopia” Elevator Pitch…, &

item.title: Chartbook #128: Mission command - NATO's Strangelove vision of freedom enacted on the Ukraine battlefield
item.description:
Russian forces attempted to cross the Siverskyi Donets river in eastern Ukraine this month using a pontoon bridge, but their tanks and armoured vehicles were picked off by Ukrainian artillery. So they tried it again. And again. And again. The Russian army made nine attempts to cross the river in the second week of May, according to Ukrainian defence chi…

URL: https://adamtooze.substack.com/p/chartbook-128-mission-command-natos?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

item.title: Memo RBA: we ought to live with inflation, more of it
item.description:
That’s the headline for my latest piece in The Conversation. The article initially ran under a different headline, chosen by the publishers with an eye to maximising the number of search terms, but this failed miserably, and my preferred headline was restored. The insistence of publishers on choosing headlines has been a c…

item.title: The Jews and Italians Against Liberalism
item.description:
An ill wind blew through the land. Life, suddenly crackling, was not what it once was. The young, they said, did not respect the old, and the nation they knew now did not resemble the nation of their memories, when chaos did not seem to swallow up so much. Crime was up, gas prices were up, and the rage they felt was no longer confined…

URL: https://rossbarkan.substack.com/p/the-jews-and-italians-against-liberalism?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: In the Generations After 1870, All That Is Solid Does Melt into Air, &

item.title: Does not compute
item.description:
There are days when I think that the history of our era, whenever it is written, will say that we were a society with manageable problems until the internet came along and ruined everything. I’m not completely convinced of this; not yet. But there are days when I think it, and more of them all the time…

URL: https://ryanavent.substack.com/p/does-not-compute?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web
